"Why not try to channel your jealousy into creativity and design your own clothes hanger? You can make it unique and personalized to your taste, and it will serve as a reminder of your accomplishments and progress."

"Consider reaching out to the people who finished their tasks seamlessly and ask for their advice or tips on how they were able to do it. They might have some valuable insights that can help you improve your own productivity and efficiency."

"Instead of focusing on the negative aspects of others' success, try to focus on the positive aspects of your own journey. Remember that everyone has their own strengths and weaknesses, and you can learn from both."

"Take a break from comparing yourself to others and focus on your own progress and achievements. Celebrate your accomplishments, no matter how small they may seem, and use them as motivation to continue working towards your goals."

"Remember that jealousy is a natural human emotion, but it can be counterproductive. Instead of letting it consume you, try to channel it into something positive, like working harder and improving your own skills and abilities."
